Title: Amba.NotFoundLog module for Orchard CMS
Description: Amba.NotFoundLog logs 404 errors for site, and shows it in admin control panel.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Amba.NotFoundLog logs 404 errors for site, and shows it in admin control panel. This module can be useful to detect 404 issues in case of site migration.



To use this module place following code to NotFound.cshtml file of your theme: 
@{
    WorkContext.Resolve<INotFoundLogService>().LogNotFound((string)Model.RequestedUrl, (string)Model.ReferrerUrl);
}
